alert.msg_template: Problem with network management reporting in frame $FR cage $CG
alert.recommendation: Record the alert ID. Call your next level of support and inform them that there is a problem with the network manager and give them the alert ID.

alert.msg_template: Problem with global counter in frame $FR cage $CG
alert.recommendation: Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the according the FRU list.

alert.recommendation: This event should not have generated an alert. Record the alert ID. Call your next level of service and indicate that there is a problem with event analysis and give them the alert ID.

alert.msg_template: D-link down between frame $FR cage $CG hub $HB port $LD and frame $NFR cage $NCG hub $NHB port $NLD
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a D-Link. Record the alert ID. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.
